metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10376 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Gajim through 0.16.7 unconditionally implements the "XEP-0146: Remote Controlling Clients" extension. This can be abused by malicious XMPP servers to, for example, extract plaintext from OTR encrypted sessions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-10376` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gajim - 0.16.6-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gajim package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.16.6-1.1').
